import React from 'react' import { Card, CardBody , CardText,CardImg, CardImgOverlay, CardTitle } from 'reactstrap' const DishdetailComponent = (props) => { const commentsItem = props.dish.comments.map((comment)=>{ return(
{comment.comment}
--{comment.author}, {comment.date}

) }) return (
{props.dish.name} {props.dish.description}

Comments

{commentsItem}
) } export default DishdetailComponent
